imdb.plot outline: Matt Edmondson writes and narrates a series about the most entertaining Guinness World Records and the brilliant characters who set them, as captured by TV shows around the globe. The programme takes viewers on a tour of record-breaking sequences, celebrating the people who have strived for fame by using their own individual talents to set one of the renowned Guinness World Records. It showcases some of the most incredible and peculiar record-breaking attempts and includes interviews with some of the biggest characters from the world of record-breaking. From the fastest dog on two wheels to the longest fingernails in the US, this fun-packed series reveals some of the most extraordinary humans and amazing animals to be found on Planet Earth. It is also jammed with the key facts and statistics for each record attempt and the people involved.
imdb.title: Totally Bonkers Guinness World Records
plot: Matt Edmondson writes and narrates entertaining Guinness World Records and characters who set them.

Matt Edmondson writes and narrates a series about the most entertaining Guinness World Records and the brilliant characters who set them, as captured by TV shows around the globe. The programme takes viewers on a tour of record-breaking sequences, celebrating the people who have strived for fame by using their own individual talents to set one of the renowned Guinness World Records. It showcases some of the most incredible and peculiar record-breaking attempts and includes interviews with some of the biggest characters from the world of record-breaking. From the fastest dog on two wheels to the longest fingernails in the US, this fun-packed series reveals some of the most extraordinary humans and amazing animals to be found on Planet Earth. It is also jammed with the key facts and statistics for each record attempt and the people involved.
